attributes.action: Stop the payment of bonus' to bank officials use the money to increase rates to savers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The banks are increasing rates at which they lend money but the rates for savers have remained pitifully low. Why not use the money that would have been paid out to undeserving bank bosses to increase rates to savers who have been penalised by the banks.
